comment._content: I'm from Amarillo and it's really cool to see some of those buildings that I've seen everyday in their prime! This is such a great picture from the old Santa Fe Railroad route!

comment._content: i love this picture. im from lubbock so this looks a lot like my hometown because amarillo and lubbock are a lot alike.
